definitions.definition: Expressing or characterized by derision ; mocking ; ridiculing .
examples: The critic's review of the film was derisive .

definitions.definition: Deserving or provoking derision or ridicule.
examples: The plot of the film was so derisive that the audience began to jeer.

main_definition: Expressing or characterized by derision ; mocking ; ridiculing .
secondary_definitions: Deserving or provoking derision or ridicule.
